snippet.title: BAD CAT (AMIGA)
snippet.description:
Zeus presents Bad Cat (un-emulated) for the Amiga A500. A pointless irritating game from the golden era of amiga gaming which should be forgotten alongside the software house and all programmers that were involved in making this game.

Year of release: 1987

One of the most pointless, irritating waste of space games i have ever played! Totally unplayable, have no idea what the bloody hell i'm doing in the 2nd & 3rd satges, it's just not worth the disk space it uses. Has one of the most patronising laughs when you fail, if you do nothing he turns to you yodels at you which makes you wanna seem him drown in acid, plus the annoying whistle noises when you jump,...ANNOYING, IRRITATING...FUCKING HATE THIS CRUDDY GAME.
Bad Cat?! More like bad game.

Hope all you Amiga fans enjoy this upload...YEAH RIGHT!

Please note: NONE of my game uploads are emulated in any way whatsoever, they are 100% original recordings by myself taken directly from the original hardware the game was intended for, that way you know you're watching the real thing.
I will also always state weather i am using any cheats in the game, if not mentioned then i am not using any.
Check out my channel (http://www.youtube.com/user/ZEUSDAZ/videos), dedicated to gamers who loved the games of yesteryear.

Feel free to leave comments on my channel and vid's.

Keeping the memory of the Amiga and it's cool games alive!!!
